title: FRAME-SPOT
description: Analyze the given frames and arrive at the bigger picture. Discover the hidden message in each picture, make the connections, and learn what the final frame whispers to you.
registration: This event comes under general registration.
rules: This event has four consecutive rounds: Round 1 (Prelims), Round 2 (Finals)
This is an individual event and team participation is not allowed.
Participants must answer within the given time frame.
The Judges’ decisions will be final.
Participants must answer within the time frame.
Questions are exclusively from kollywood movies.
Difficulty level will be increased for the round
